name: Remy Russell
title: Product Management
objective: Ensure success of the business and customers
Understand the customer and user experience to anticipate potential opportunities
Use quantitative and qualitative analysis to discover problems worth solving
Inspire cross-functional collaboration to design and develop valuable product features
Prioritize tasks for the engineers and partner with internal stakeholders to align on strategy

description: Leadership transitioned my role to the engineering team to leverage my technical skills and enthusiasm about our new integration implementations. I’ve since helped to shape Eccovia’s API product and solution designs to empower our customers in the Health and Human Services industry to serve their clients.
... transitioned three previously-implemented customer integrations to our new integration framework
Drove successful implementations for two of Eccovia’s largest new customers
... designing new destination schema for our solutions

professional_experience.position: Business Analyst II, MMIS Implementation Project
description: Documented comprehensive design details for the Provider Enrollment Subsystem to guide development and testing.

professional_experience.position: Intern, Web Design for College of Engineering OSA
description: On behalf of the College of Engineering Office of Student Affairs (OSA), I collaborated with over ten departments/programs to create, reorganize, and redesign their web content under a common WordPress theme to improve the user interface and the continuity across the web pages.

education.degree: BSE in Industrial & Operations Engineering, Certificate in Entrepreneurship
education.details: Relevant coursework in relational database design, computer programming, process improvement, modeling, simulation, statistical analysis, decision analysis, lean management, business development, entrepreneurial market strategy, financial accounting, technical communication, etc.
